summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing the scheduling of a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein and several associates. Lesley Groff is coordinating the timing of the meeting, which includes Paul Morris and others, and suggests moving the meeting time to accommodate everyone's schedules.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein and others, suggesting changes to the meeting time.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is involved in scheduling the meeting and communicates with Lesley Groff about the availability of attendees.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the host of the meeting and is requesting a change in the meeting time.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is mentioned as an attendee of the meeting and is bringing additional participants.

persons.name: Caroline Kitidis
persons.context: Caroline Kitidis is mentioned as the Head of the Key Clients Partners Group and is attending the meeting with Paul Morris.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.context: Tazia Smith is mentioned as a Director in the Key Clients Partners Group and is attending the meeting with Paul Morris.

connections.description: Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are coordinating a meeting together.
Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein.
Paul Morris is bringing Caroline Kitidis to the meeting as part of his team.
Paul Morris is bringing Tazia Smith to the meeting as part of his team.

events.title: Meeting Coordination
events.description: A meeting is scheduled to take place at Jeffrey Epstein's home with various attendees.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein.
The meeting is scheduled for September 6, 2013, at Epstein's home.
Paul Morris is bringing two associates, Caroline Kitidis and Tazia Smith, to the meeting.
There was a request to change the meeting time from 10 AM to either 12 PM or 1 PM.
